title: GREEK PITA PIZZAS
directions: In a medium sized bowl combine the cucumber, yellow bell pepper, tomatoes, onion, olives, olive oil, vinegar, salt, and oregano.
Spread a tablespoon of hummus on top of each mini pita.
Divide the Greek salad mixture evenly on top of each pita.
Top the pizzas with a tablespoon of feta cheese.
ingredients: 4 tablespoons hummus, I used an original flavor
